aboutUs.sectionText: PO ''support for Ukrainian it-products in video games industry'' was created to systematically support Ukrainian products of the video game industry, as well as companies, teams and specialists who work on them. Together with our partners - the world's leading technology companies - we invest in the economic recovery of the state and support the native video game industry.

coworkingSection.sectionText: Free and secure offices, fully equipped with furniture and appliances, with uninterrupted Internet access

coaching.sectionText: Projects and teams selected by the Supervisory Board, will have access to the coaching program established by SUITP and Games Gathering, the biggest B2B conference in Eastern Europe dedicated to game development.

support.sectionText: Projects and teams selected by the Supervisory Board, will have access to funding & support by SUITP and partners.
support.badgeThree: Access to resources of SUITP contributors
support.etsBoosteroid: e.g. free listing and promotion of a game on Boosteroid cloud gaming service

contact.subtitle: Leave a request or contact us via mail
contact.name: Name*
contact.agree: By submitting this form I consent to having SUITP collect and process my personal details and agree with

coworkingPage.freeContent: Most jobs are in the sheltered area. Work continuously during alarms.
coworkingPage.safeContent: Diesel generators and high-speed Internet in case of blackouts
coworkingPage.allhaveContent: Delicious coffee, tea and snacks, a lounge area and a large game area

workPage.title: Working space
workPage.content: Робочі місця обладнані технікою із безперебійним доступом до живлення та інтернету.

count.totalPlaceZone: All workplaces are in a safe area

equipment.title: Necessary equipment
equipment.content: Everything you need for comfortable work

game.title: Game and lounge area
game.content: A recreation area where everyone can choose an activity for themselves. Video zone with sofas, computers, huge TVs and ultra-modern sound systems. Play or chat, you choose.
game.cardOneText: Hundreds of games from popular platforms on any device thanks to the Boosteroid cloud service
game.cardTwoText: Play Playstation 5, xBox, Steam Deck or immerse yourself in augmented reality thanks to VR gadgets.
game.cardThirdText: Here you can relax, distract yourself from work, chat or just listen to music or be in silence.
game.cardFourText: Own kitchen with goodies, talented barista. Here you can taste delicious business lunches and many different dishes.

care.title: We will take care of you
care.content: And we will also provide the necessary for your comfort and safety:
